Entrance - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.school
A class to model the entrance of the player's game board: a entrance contains a list of students, that can be received from a cloud card, and can be moved on islands or dining table

evaluate(Player, ColorCharacter, List<Player>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils.CalculatorTeacherOwnership
Given a list of players evaluate the teacher's owner
evaluate(List<Player>, Island) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils.CalculatorInfluence
If the game's rules include teams of players this function evaluates team influence: at first it creates teams from the list of players; for each team(a list of players with the same color) it evaluates the team influence which will be the sum of each team member's influence; then it compares each team's influence, in case it founds a most influencing team, return the list of players of the most influencing team; in case of a draw(no team has a unique maximal value of influence), it frees the current island and returns an empty player list.
evaluateForPlayer(Player, Island) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils.CalculatorInfluence
Sum tower influence and student influence of the player
evaluateInfluences(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.Game
Given an island calculate influence on that island, whether there is single players influence or teams influence
exitFromApp() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.controller.GameBoardController
on click of the button close the application
exitFromApp(ActionEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.controller.LoginController
Closes the application when the close button is clicked.
